name: d20's First d8
description:
Ever wanted to see the world through the eyes of a die? How about go on a date with the neighbor's die?  Explore a fully interactable world on your quest to roll across the street to see the die of your dreams!

Grab the dice with the mouse and drag to launch yourself across the world.

GMTK Game Jam 2022 submission. This game was made in 48 hours!
